docs.title: Digital Garden
docs.text: Welcome to my digital garden, as ChatGPT called it Here you can find various resources and information about different subjects, from modding (homebrew) to recipes I will be adding stuff here, hopefully daily as I plan to start yet again the "Album a Day" challenge for 2026 So stick around and write me at: (to be announced)

docs.title: 2026 update
docs.text: Album a Day is not happening. Too much work and very little motivation right now for it

docs.title: January
docs.text: 1-7 8-14 15-22 23-31 1970 #5 Center Right roght 1970 #6 Center Right

docs.title: Guidelines
docs.text:
At least an album a day for the week, meaning that each week has a minimum of 7 albums, Saturdays and Sundays may become difficult to research and listen to an album so those 2 albums from those days might be picked up earlier in the week

Research will ve conducted in the "Album of the Year" website, were I will be picking an album from the top 10 to 25 from each year for a diferent decade each 2 months, so: January and February will be 1970s for day 1 lets say I pick one from the top ten of 1970, day 2 from 1971, amd so one without skipping a year so from 1970 to 79 in 60 days, in order, no maximum per year, at least one each year Marxh and April 1980-1989...

Fridays can be used for weakly releases, meaning, if there is an album to be release that week, it can be used as the album for Friday.

Fridays can also be used to a personal pick, aswell as Mondays

Special seasons can be used as a theme for albums, respecting the year and order we are in.

Holidays or/and vacations can be flacky and i might bow even show up, those days het backlogged, they have ro

All albums must be logged and a rating can be given, optional

A favorite song must be picked from each album, multiple is allowed

Musicboard must also ve logged and a Spotify playlist will be updated as soon as possible with the favorites (link for it soon)

Rules will be added as neeeded but never changed or vent, its not a challenge if we modify the rules as we please

docs.title: The ones that really stuck in
docs.text:
To start, 2025 gave me a gut wrenching album "Polar (Traveller's Log)" by Gabriel Ólafs The commentary really males it vone alive, I feel there, alone, freezing What an amazing piece of music

Others should also be mentioned, there are plenty of albums that stuck with me

Also, Kid A, Radiohead, amazing, the best from them

docs.title: F1
docs.text:
This year (2026) I've decided to watch Formula 1 Until it starts I'm going to watch the 2025 season and keep track here of the ones watched and where I left off (can't watch a full race at once)

Also, new rules this year and new engine, got to read more about it to have an idea of the changes and whether if I like it or not

docs.title: 2025 Season
docs.text:
(which I didn't see everything yet)

Australian Grand Prix: March 14-16 (Melbourne) Chinese Grand Prix: March 21-23 (Shanghai) (Sprint) Japanese Grand Prix: April 4-6 (Suzuka) Bahrain Grand Prix: April 11-13 (Sakhir) Saudi Arabian Grand Prix: April 18-20 (Jeddah) Miami Grand Prix: May 2-4 (Miami) (Sprint) Emilia Romagna Grand Prix: May 16-18 (Imola) 1.40'' Monaco Grand Prix: May 23-25 (Monaco) Spanish Grand Prix: May 30-June 1 (Barcelona) Canadian Grand Prix: June 13-15 (Montreal) Austrian Grand Prix: June 27-29 (Spielberg) British Grand Prix: July 4-6 (Silverstone) Belgian Grand Prix: July 25-27 (Spa-Francorchamps) (Sprint) Hungarian Grand Prix: August 1-3 (Budapest) Dutch Grand Prix: August 29-31 (Zandvoort) Italian Grand Prix: September 5-7 (Monza) Azerbaijan Grand Prix: September 19-21 (Baku) Singapore Grand Prix: October 3-5 (Singapore) United States Grand Prix: October 17-19 (Austin) (Sprint) Mexican Grand Prix: October 24-26 (Mexico City) Brazilian Grand Prix: November 7-9 (Sao Paulo) (Sprint) Las Vegas Grand Prix: November 20-22 (Las Vegas) Qatar Grand Prix: November 28-30 (Lusail) (Sprint) Abu Dhabi Grand Prix: December 5-7 (Yas Marina)

The ones I saw already

docs.title: Risenhames
docs.text: Learning the game still, first fort in some time

docs.title: MotorTown
docs.text: Starting up, next step, create a company, learn the game also

docs.title: Risenhames Fortress
docs.text:
• World: Emeathira "The Eternal Planes"
  • Civilization: The Blotted Construct
  • Fortress: Risenhames
  • Expedition Leader: Lorbam Sharkrings, 55 M

docs.title: Spring
docs.text:
Infrastructure

Entrance to the fort. Dormitory, small farm plot, still and small workshop (stone and wood work) was established. Dinning hall with metting area was defined and costructed. Stockpiles were implemented. Wood is defined. Pasture is defined as well.

Animals

Only same sex animals from the species worth breeding, we need to trade some animals in the next trader visit. Some animals have aged.

Population

Stray dog has matured, bredding of dogs is now possible.

Military

War dog training into consideration.

docs.title: Summer
docs.text:
Infrastructure

More rooms were created, a room for pray has been hollowed out but we do not have enough dwarves to pray The butcher shop and trading post will be relocated inside, defenses are a priority even in a seemingly peaceful place, specially after the horse incident Some more workshops were made, the fort is looking a bit confusing, a stair going down was ordered and a more organized fort will be planned out below Offices were also improvised beside our hall, the bookeeper Imush is hard at work

Population

Some migrantes came, it seems they brough 2 dwarves children, how nice , promply (after some in truth) childern were forbiden of labor. They will age and work for many years, we don't want them to resent the creator for working when still a child Some animals came too, a pet lamb and a donkey. the Lamb is named Eden, a male

Military

One of the dogs found funny to bit a horse and latching on to him The remainig dogs started to attack the horse, riping it from all types of fat In the confusion, Shorast became a militia commander and recruited 2 more dwarves to take down the horse, thinking it was him that started it all and the dogs were in danger Nil and Zefon followed Shorast and took the horse down, blood and teeth were scatered in the main corridor but it served as a reminder, we need to be ready for the real deal

Events

The dogs were at a horse again, this time the dwarves let it be as it was far and the horse was just running from here

docs.title: Autumn
docs.text:
Events

Miasma has erupted in the corridor, right by the horse that is dead for months and apparentlly isn't worth taking out to the refuse pile After some more rearranging of the stockpiles the horse body was removed or so is thought because is no longer there A Caravan arrived, time to get some goods and hopefully some more animals for food And a hard realisation hits the fort... We don't have many worthy items, not to say none, we might have to sell of some animals to get the "right" sex ones A bunch of dingos appeared and apparentlly some tried to enter the fort, one was caught in the traps, fortunatelly It's time to hide inside given this "attack", 11 dingos on the loose, 1 more caged The population hidden for a bit but the dingos didn't seem that great of a threat so they will keep an eye of each other but free to work again

Infrastrures

The downstairs "fort" is going well, is being planned all the way, oak floors, feather wood in the rooms, smooth walls, nice doors (all the same materials). It's going along

Trading

Some gems were traded for a female donkey The caravan had an intersting scrool but way to expensive for our humble fort for now We requested some yak cows for next year, we might have more goods then and trade in a companion to our male yak

Population

Some more migrants arrived and soon after all tasks were defined They arrived just in time, more working hands were indeed needed. Dormitory needs an urgent expansion

Animals

The dogs made puppies, one puppy but, enough for now Soon after 2 more puppies born, it was more that one after all

docs.title: Winter
docs.text:
Animals

Very uneventful winter, a cat has grown up and the rooms construction on the lower floor is coming along, soon some bed rooms will be assigned Now the dingo, the caged and being trained in our fort one is picking a fight, on the first interaction we stay put but ready, the squad was called Soon after, said dingo, reverted to wild so... time to take it out Some open arteries and severed parts later the dingo is dealt with, all normal again Some stuff happened after all

docs.title: Spring
docs.text:
Sping again, nearly a year has passed since our arrival, the fort is coming along

Population

A child has born, we are now 19 dwarves

Animals

Some more puppies were born, our war dogs will come along after all, 3 of them for now until the pupppier age

Mining

A staircase down is being made, we hope to discover more minerals and precious stones and in case we reach, a cavern

docs.title: Summer
docs.text:
Training begins and so it needs, until now only the Militia commander has some fighting skill. Not conserning at all We have visitors, as of 27th Hematite (in case something goes missing and we have to check the records) Let's hide our precious stuff, 2 humans came along (and 2 dwarves) A baby was born, Thob had a boy The Squad, The Creative Heroes, decided to go on a mission, why? Death wish if you ask anyone else... The raid will take place in the human castle of Pearsaviors, population <10 so maybe empty? We are at peace with them so the squad will be carefull but, artifacts are rumoured to be here, who knows And soon enough, they returned already There was a fight, was not expecting that. We might be in trouble with their people now. Correction, we are in trouble with their people, ops So next mission, demand tribute, why not?? The squad made it in one piece against some humans, they are less now so, easier The 4 visitors are still here, kind of locked in the tavern's dormitory I say kind of because there is no lock but they entered and are just there, with the tavern next door It seems that there is no one there, the report came empty Time to knock on others door One more raid there, pillage the place for good The squad got some stuff, it's left to see if it's a artifact but some stuff Our attacks for now are done, time to train harder

The squad brought home a scroll, the first literature in our community, it's a win to their eyes

Another season that no migrants were interested in our community, I don't blame them, valuable items are not being produced, materials are still in the rough

docs.title: Motor Town
docs.text: Need to level up the driving skill to get a company
